General.Name: Chengdu Qinchuan IoT Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Chengdu Qinchuan IoT Technology Co.Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, sale, and servicing of Internet of Things (IoT) and smart cities solutions. It offers IoT smart gas solutions; IoT smart gas meter operating systems; IC card smart and membrane gas meters; and IoT smart and IC card smart water meters. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.
